channel.title: Customer support in other languages
channel.description: I am considering localising my app to Japanese and Chinese. I am a bit worried about doing customer support with countries where most people probably have average to limited English skill, so what is peoples experience?

item.title: Customer support in other languages
item.dc:creator: craigvn
item.description:
I am considering localising my app to Japanese and Chinese. I am a bit worried about doing customer support with countries where most people probably have average to limited English skill, so what is peoples experience?
